description.translate: That is how things are, with no return possible.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Cœur de Myla\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Telles vont les choses,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7sans retour possible.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7That is how things are,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7with no return possible.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HAS§c-2\"}"]}}
